entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and a few rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023
